xml.title: PM01 - Décompte appels traités par jour, statut et opérateur
xml.SQL: SELECT cont_lastcall, SUBSTRING(cont_commentaires, 1, 3) AS OPERATEUR, cont_callstatus AS StatutAppel, COUNT(cont_callstatus) AS EFFECTIF FROM annuaires WHERE cont_camp_id = [PARAM.1] and cont_specialite = [PARAM.2] GROUP BY cont_lastcall, SUBSTRING(cont_commentaires, 1, 3), cont_callstatus ORDER BY cont_lastcall, SUBSTRING(cont_commentaires, 1, 3), cont_callstatus
